Articles.Content: Awesome suits! I thought a pretty good idea would be the Lego space man from back in the day. I imagine it wouldn't be that tough considering its simplistic design.

I did think about Lego style suits but we'll see.

In other news apologies for the broken pictures. The Irony is that it was actually the joker who broke them... Today's lesson was don't use photobucket to host your sig picture and post on forums a lot... Normal service will be resumed soon when I get back to my PC.
Fixed pics on main page. Rest of pics will appear in a couple of days. MOAR VOTEZ ON POLL PLZ!!!
Two days left on voting for the next batch of suits. Make it count!
The Rebellion has begun!
Nice! KSO texture work ok?

Nice! KSO texture work ok?

Yep! STS 145 (Laythe return mission) will be her first flight!

Attention testers!!!!! Are you all awake? Will be sending out a pre release of the new pack system very soon!

Anyone else who wants an early test can apply - Test with reports and earn a special suit!

Current list of testers is:

CERVERUS - Koviet Union

drtedastro - KSP

Sippyfrog - KSP

Airouge - Kerbal States

likke_A_boss - Kerbal States

Space_Kraken - FASA

Ok the new build is finally progressing. The worst part the READ ME explaining how the latest TextureReplacer works for noobs is finally done!!! New texture filing format is decided and implemented. Base configuration file is written.

To do list:

Write configuration files for packs including new "BEAST MODE" which I will be using on my personal "World Space" install.

Assemble packs.

Dispatch to testers.

Release

Can't wait i'll help any way I can
Last 12 hours of voting so make it count!
PLEASE I LOVE THIS MOD get rid of those fake vents on the helmets side and mouth. I'm begging you I LOVE this mod so much and visors are awesome and the suits but the helmets vents

PLEASE I LOVE THIS MOD get rid of those fake vents on the helmets side and mouth. I'm begging you I LOVE this mod so much and visors are awesome and the suits but the helmets vents

The helmets need a re-work and will get one I promise. More colours, styles and variations are on the horizon soon. Hopefully something for everyone.

Announcing the winner of the poll:

The next project will be - New types of real suit - modern and past era for all you real life re-creationists. With 39.47% of the vote. Thank you to everyone who voted! I didn't know what was was going to win until today so here are my plans.

Implementation:

So the plan here is to introduce new types of suits and helmets in the STYLE OF THE ORIGINALS. I will try to re-create as well as I can. But you must realise that certain things cannot be changed like the shape of the Kerbal. Head shape. Suit shape. Helmet shape. We are currently stuck with this until a way to change is found.

I STATE THIS HERE AND NOW!!! THESE NEW SUITS WILL NOT BE EXACT REPLICAS AS THIS IS CURRENTLY IMPOSSIBLE. I WILL NOT BE DRAWN INTO LONG, STUPID AND POINTLESS DEBATES ON THIS. THIS DEBATE ENDS HERE AND NOW!!! DON'T LIKE THIS MAKE YOUR OWN.

The plan is to roll them out in groups as they are done. As usual I will post updates and progress for each suit as development happens. Current planned suits are listed below. Each new suit variation will come with appropriate patch variations. Proot's original suit that my current main texture is based on already resembles a U.S. Apollo 11 A7L. I will re-work this but not for a while.

Russian

SK-1 - Vostok

Berkut - Voskhod 2

Krechet-94 - Soviet Moon landing

Strizh - Buran

Sokol-K - Soyuz IVA

Sokol-KV2 - Soyuz IVA

Orlan - EVA - Will also be making a Jetpack in this style!!!

U.S.

Navy Mark IV - Mercury programme.

Gemini G4C - Gemini IVA and EVA suit.

Apollo A7L - Apollo IVA and EVA.

Apollo A7LB - Apollo 15-17 and Skylab IVA and EVA.

Advanced Crew Escape Suit - Space Shuttle crews later IVA suit A few important patches only.

Extravehicular Mobility Unit - Space Shuttle and International Space Station - Will also be making a Jetpack in this style!!!

The helmets need a re-work and will get one I promise. More colours, styles and variations are on the horizon soon. Hopefully something for everyone.

YES I cant wait because I really think the suits and visors look awesome.

Green Skull has now 'officially' teamed up with Kraken Space Industries LLC! KSI [Kraken Space Industries LLC.] will be providing custom skyboxes of real and not-so real galaxies, along with special requests. Green Skull will be releasing the first skybox soon: The Andromeda Galaxy!!

If you ever do 1 for SpaceX Falcon 9 http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/29388-LazTek-SpaceX-Launch-Pack-2-3-and-Exploration-Expansion-1-1-23-%282-28-14%29?highlight=SpaceX+Falcon here is a patch https://www.dropbox.com/s/5wd8mnjutex0qww/spacex3emblem-298x300.png

Just throwing in a suggestion:

I'll try to do it myself, but I'm sure dem paint.net skillz aren't good enough.

Very cool!

Just throwing in a suggestion:

http://files.tested.com/photos/2012/12/19/42992-z1.jpg

http://upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/d/dd/Z-1_Spacesuit_Prototype_-_standing_Nov_2012.jpg

I'll try to do it myself, but I'm sure dem paint.net skillz aren't good enough.

Because ppl with humps shouldn't be excluded form space programs at all. This thing can be as technologic as it can, but sure it's weird. And I'm not sure if it would be possible to reproduce such a different "build" into the texture, but it's just a guess.

Hey Green Skull, do you know if it is possible to set custom helmets and IVA suits to kerbals in the TextureReplacer configs, just like the EVA suits and heads? Uh... I know it would be better to ask at it's thread, but I found yours first and, well, doesn't hurt to ask, I guess...
Yes add them to the custom suit folder in a specific suit, then assign to a specific kerbal.

Have you guys seen the new NASA suit proposals...

They look like something out of a SciFi film... It's the new Z2 suit.

Next job... KSP versions lol.

And if you think this is just a hoax drawing...

http://jscfeatures.jsc.nasa.gov/z2/

This thing looks like it came from a scifi movie from the 50's.

And thanks, Green Skull. I should have guessed it is that easy.

A few people have requested that now. I still think NASA copied Buzz Lightyear... whilst I can do the suit the helmet won't be clear and it won't glow in the dark but I'll add it to the list of real suits.

Also my Jebediah brakes for mars...

Edited April 20, 2014 by Green Skull

Nah... But maybe...
